title: No broadcast start milestone Start from the beginning - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is entitled for live game playback
AND Hide Spoilers is set to OFF
AND a stream is mediaState=MEDIA_ON before the start of the game broadcast
AND the user has not previously played the video feed/stream
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a team video feed/stream
AND the user selects the "Start From The Beginning" button
custom_expected:
THEN Playback starts at the beginning of the stream
AND the scrubber playhead is at the furthest left position on AND the scrubber bar
AND the elapsed time in the scrubber starts at 00:00

title: Broadcast start milestone Start from the beginning - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is entitled for live game playback
AND Hide Spoilers is set to OFF
AND a game is live after the start of the game broadcast
AND the user has not previously played the video feed/stream
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a team video feed/stream
AND the user selects the "Start From The Beginning" button
custom_expected:
THEN playback starts at the beginning of the game broadcast
AND the scrubber playhead is in the middle of the scrubber bar
AND the scrubber bar is blue to the left of the playhead
AND the scrubber bar is gray to the right of the playhead
AND the elapsed time in the scrubber is not 00:00

title: No broadcast start milestone Resume bookmark Start from the beginning - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is entitled for live game playback
AND Hide Spoilers is set to OFF
AND a stream is mediaState=MEDIA_ON before the start of the game broadcast
AND a resume bookmark is saved before the game broadcast start
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a team video feed/stream
AND the user selects the "Start From The Beginning" button
custom_expected:
THEN Playback starts at the beginning of the stream
AND the scrubber playhead is at the furthest left position on the scrubber bar
AND the elapsed time in the scrubber starts at 00:00

title: Broadcast start milestone Resume bookmark Start from the beginning - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is entitled for live game playback
AND Hide Spoilers is set to OFF
AND a game is live after the start of the game broadcast
AND the user has previously played the video feed/stream
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a team video feed/stream
AND the user selects the "Start From The Beginning" button
custom_expected:
THEN playback starts at the beginning of the game broadcast
AND the scrubber playhead is in the middle of the scrubber bar
AND the scrubber bar is blue to the left of the playhead
AND the scrubber bar is gray to the right of the playhead
AND the elapsed time in the scrubber is not 00:00

title: Resume bookmark after game broadcast start Start from the beginning - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is entitled for live game playback
AND Hide Spoilers is set to OFF
AND a team feed/stream is mediaState=MEDIA_ON
AND the live point is before the game broadcast start time
custom_steps:
WHEN the user starts watching at the live point, before the game broadcast start time
AND the user exits the feed/stream at any point after the top of the 1st inning
AND the user selects the same feed/stream again
AND the user selects the "Start From The Beginning" button
custom_expected:
THEN playback will start at the game broadcast start point, before the top of the 1st inning
AND inning markers are displayed to the right of the playhead

title: First playback of an archive game - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is entitled for archive game playback
AND Hide Spoilers is OFF
AND the user has not previously watched a game feed/stream
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects an archive feed/stream that doesn't have any saved resume bookmarks
custom_expected:
THEN playback starts from the broadcast start point
AND the scrubber playhead is at the furthest left postion on the scrubber bar
AND the elapsed time in the scrubber starts at 00:00

title: Start from the beginning with Resume bookmark from live game - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is entitled for archive game playback
AND Hide Spoilers is OFF
AND the user has previously watched a LIVE game feed/stream
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the archive feed/stream of the previously watched live game
AND the user selects the "Start From The Beginning" button
custom_expected:
THEN playback starts from the broadcast start point
AND the scrubber playhead is at the furthest left postion on the scrubber bar
AND the elapsed time in the scrubber starts at 00:00

custom_preconds:

custom_steps:

AND the user selects the "Start From The Beginning" button
custom_expected:
THEN playback starts from the broadcast start point
AND the scrubber playhead is at the furthest left postion on the scrubber bar
AND the elapsed time in the scrubber starts at 00:00

title: Start from the beginning with Resume bookmark from archive game - Hide Spoilers ON
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is entitled for archive game playback

AND the user has previously watched an archive game feed/stream

custom_expected:
THEN playback starts from the broadcast start point

AND the elapsed time in the scrubber starts at 00:00

title: Live point before 1st inning - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is entitled for live game playback
AND Hide Spoilers is turned OFF
AND team feeds are mediaState=MEDIA_ON
AND the game has not started the 1st inning
custom_steps:
WHEN the user starts watching at the live point
AND the live point is before the 1st inning
AND the user continues watching the entire game
custom_expected:
THEN inning markers are displayed in the scrubber bar as each half inning begins
AND the top of the inning is identified with a triangle pointing up, left of the inning number
AND the bottom on the inning is identified with a triangle pointing down, left of the inning number

title: Live point after top of the 1st inning - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is entitled for live game playback
AND Hide Spoilers is turned OFF
AND team feeds are mediaState=MEDIA_ON
AND the game is in progress past the top of the first inning
custom_steps:
WHEN the user starts watching at the live point
AND the live point is after the top of the 1st inning
AND the user continues watching the entire game
custom_expected:
THEN inning markers are displayed to the left of the playback head for innings that have already occurred
AND inning markers are displayed in the scrubber bar as each half inning begins
AND the top of the inning is identified with a triangle pointing up, left of the inning number
AND the bottom of the inning is identified with a triangle pointing down, left of the inning number

title: Resume bookmark after the top of the 1st inning - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is entitled for live game playback
AND Hide Spoilers is turned OFF
AND team feeds are mediaState=MEDIA_ON
AND a team feed/stream has a resume bookmark after the top of the 1st inning
custom_steps:
WHEN the user resumes the same game feed/stream before the game is Final
AND the user watches the game for at least a half inning
custom_expected:
THEN inning markers display to the left of the playback head for the portion of the game the user watched previously
AND inning markers display to the right of the playback head for the portion of the game that has occurred, but the user has not watched
AND inning markers are populated to the far right in the scrubber bar as each half inning begins

title: Resume bookmark after the top of the 1st inning Start from the beginning - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is entitled for live game playback
AND Hide Spoilers is turned OFF
AND team feeds are mediaState=MEDIA_ON
AND a team feed/stream has a resume bookmark after the top of the 1st inning
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the same game feed/stream before the game is Final
AND the user selects the "Start From The Beginning" button
AND the user watches the game for at least a half inning
custom_expected:
THEN playback starts at the game broadcast start milestone
AND inning markers display to the right of the playback head indicating innings that have already occurred
AND inning markers are populated to the far right of the scrubber bar as each half inning begins

title: Live point before 1st inning - Hide Spoilers ON
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is entitled for live game playback
AND Hide Spoilers is turned ON
AND team feeds are mediaState=MEDIA_ON
AND the game has not started the 1st inning
custom_steps:
WHEN the user starts watching at the live point
AND the live point is before the 1st inning
AND the user continues watching the entire game
custom_expected:
THEN inning markers are displayed in the scrubber bar as each half inning begins
AND the top of the inning is identified with a triangle pointing up, left of the inning number
AND the bottom on the inning is identified with a triangle pointing down, left of the inning number

title: Live point after top of the 1st inning - Hide Spoilers ON
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is entitled for live game playback
AND Hide Spoilers is turned ON
AND team feeds are mediaState=MEDIA_ON
AND the game is in progress past the top of the first inning
custom_steps:
WHEN the user starts watching at the live point
AND the live point is after the top of the 1st inning
AND the user continues watching the entire game
custom_expected:
THEN inning markers are displayed to the left fo the playback head for innings that have already occurred
AND inning markers are displayed in the scrubber bar as each half inning begins
AND the top of the inning is identified with a triangle pointing up, left of the inning number
AND the bottom of the inning is identified with a triangle pointing down, left of the inning number

title: Resume bookmark after the top of the 1st - Hide Spoilers ON
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is entitled for live game playback
AND Hide Spoilers is turned ON
AND team feeds are mediaState=MEDIA_ON
AND a team feed/stream has a resume bookmark after the top of the 1st inning
custom_steps:
WHEN the user resumes the same game feed/stream before the game is Final
AND the user watches the game for at least a half inning
custom_expected:
THEN inning markers display to the left of the playback head for the portion of the game the user watched previously
AND inning markers do not display to the right of the playback head for the portion of the game that has occurred, but the user has not watched
AND inning markers are populated to the left of the playback head as each half inning begins

title: Resume bookmark after the top of the 1st inning Start from the beginning - Hide Spoilers ON
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is entitled for live game playback
AND Hide Spoilers is turned ON
AND team feeds are mediaState=MEDIA_ON
AND a team feed/stream has a resume bookmark after the top of the 1st inning
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the same game feed/stream before the game is Final
AND the user selects the "Start From The Beginning" button
AND the user watches the game for at least a half inning
custom_expected:
THEN playback starts at the game broadcast start milestone
AND inning markers do not display to the right of the playback head indicating innings that have already occurred
AND inning markers are populated to the left of the playback head as each half inning milestone is crossed

title: **REVIEW** Live point Skip through inning markers - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is entitled for live game playback
AND Hide Spoilers is turned OFF
AND the live point is in the 7th inning or later
AND the user is watching at the live point
custom_steps:
WHEN the user opens the scrubber/player controls
AND the user selects each top and bottom inning in the line score
custom_expected:
THEN a tile with text and thumbnails display for each milestone
AND game playback matches the inning marker

title: **REVIEW** Start from the beginning Skip through inning markers - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is entitled for live game playback
AND Hide Spoilers is turned OFF
AND a game is live in the 3rd inning or later
AND the user selects the "Start From Beginning" button to initiate playback
custom_steps:
WHEN the user opens the scrubber/player controls
AND the user selects each top and bottom inning in the line score
custom_expected:
THEN a tile with text and thumbnails display for each milestone
AND game playback matches the inning marker

title: **REVIEW** Resume Skip through inning markers - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is entitle for live game playback
AND Hide Spoilers is turned OFF
AND a game is live in the 7th inning or later, but still in progress
AND a resume bookmark is in the 2nd inning
AND the user selects the "Resume" button to initiate playback
custom_steps:
WHEN the user opens the scrubber/player controls
AND the user selects each top and bottom inning in the line score
custom_expected:
THEN a tile with text and thumbnails display for each milestone
AND game playback matches the inning marker

title: **REVIEW** Skip through inning markers - Hide Spoilers ON
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is entitle for live game playback
AND Hide Spoilers is ON
custom_steps:
WHEN the user watches a live game
WHEN the user opens the scrubber/player controls
custom_expected:
THEN inning markers only display for innings the user has already watched
AND the user is able to skip to innings displayed in the line score

title: Initial archive playback - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is entitled for archive game playback
AND Hide Spoilers is turned OFF
AND team feeds are mediaState=MEDIA_ARCHIVE
AND the feed does not contain a resume bookmark
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects an archive game
AND the user selects a team feed for playback
custom_expected:
THEN playback starts at the broadcast start milestone
AND all inning markers for the game are displayed in the bcrubber bar
AND the top of the inning is identified with a triangle pointing up, to the left of the inning number
AND the bottom of the inning is identified with a triangle pointing down, left of the inning number

title: Resume archive playback - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is entitled for archive game playback
AND Hide Spoilers is turned OFF
AND team feeds are mediaState=MEDIA_ARCHIVE
AND the feed contains a resume bookmark after the top of the 1st inning
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a previously watched archive game
AND the user selects a previously watched team feed
AND the user selects the "Resume" button
custom_expected:
THEN playback starts at the resume bookmark
AND all inning markers for the game are displayed in the scrubber bar
AND the top of the inning is identified with a triangle pointing up, left of the inning number
AND the bottom of the inning is identified with a triangle pointing down, left of the inning number

title: Start from the beginning archive playback - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is entitled for archive game playback
AND Hide Spoilers is turned OFF
AND team feeds are mediaState=MEDIA_ARCHIVE
AND the feed contains a resume bookmark after the top of the 1st inning
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a previously watched archive game
AND the user selects a previously watched team feed
AND the user selects the "Start From The Beginning" button
custom_expected:
THEN playback starts at the game broadcast milestone
AND the elapsed time in the scrbber starts at 00:00, and counts up as the video plays
AND all inning markers for the game are displayed in the scrubber bar
AND the top of the inning is identified with a triangle pointing up, left of the inning number
AND the bottom of the inning is identified with a triangle pointing down, left of the inning number

title: Initial archive playback - Hide Spoilers ON
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is entitled for archive game playback
AND Hide Spoilers is turned ON
AND team feeds are mediaState=MEDIA_ARCHIVE
AND the feed does not contain a resume bookmark
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects an archive game
AND the user selects a team feed for playback
AND the user watches the game for at least a half inning
custom_expected:
THEN playback starts at the broadcast start milestone
AND all inning markers for the game are not displayed in the scrubber bar
AND inning markers are populated to the left of the playback head as each half inning milestone is crossed

title: Resume archive playback - Hide Spoilers ON
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is entitled for archive game playback
AND Hide Spoilers is turned ON
AND team feeds are mediaState=MEDIA_ARCHIVE
AND the feed contains a resume bookmark after the top of the 1st inning
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a previously watched archive game
AND the user selects a previously watched team feed
AND the user selects the "Resume" button
AND the user watches the game for at least a half inning
custom_expected:
THEN playback starts at the resume bookmark
AND inning markers are displayed to the left of the playback head
AND inning markers are not displayed to the right of the playback head
AND inning markers will populate to the left of the playback head as the start of each half inning is crossed

title: Start from the beginning archive playback - Hide Spoilers ON
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is entitled for archive game playback
AND Hide Spoilers is turned ON
AND team feeds are mediaState=MEDIA_ARCHIVE
AND the feed contains a resume bookmark after the top of the 1st inning
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a previously watched archive game
AND the user selects a previously watched team feed
AND the user selects the "Start From The Beginning" button
custom_expected:
THEN playback starts at the game broadcast milestone
AND the elapsed time in the scrbber starts at 00:00, and counts up as the video plays
AND all inning markers for the game are not displayed in the scrubber bar
AND inning markers are displayed to the left of the playback head as each half inning milestone is crossed
AND the top of the inning is identified with a triangle pointing up, left of the inning number
AND the bottom of the inning is identified with a triangle pointing down, left of the inning number

title: **REVIEW** Initial archive playback Skip through inning markers - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is entitled for archive game playback
AND Hide Spoilers is turned OFF
AND the archive game does not contain a resume bookmark
custom_steps:
WHEN the user initiates archive game playback
AND the user opens the scrubber/player controls
AND the user selects each top and bottom inning in the line score
custom_expected:
THEN a tile with text and thumbnails display for each milestone
AND the playback head jumps to the appropriate inning marker
AND the game playback point matches the inning marker

custom_expected:
THEN a tile with text and thumbnails display for each milestone
AND the playback head jumps to the appropriate inning marker
AND the game playback point matches the inning marker

custom_expected:

AND the playback head jumps to the appropriateinning marker

title: **REVIEW** Skip through inning markers - Hide Spoilers ON
custom_preconds:

AND Hide Spoilers is ON
custom_steps:

AND the user opens the scrubber/player controls
custom_expected:
